headline: AT&T Recommends Shareholders Reject Mini-Tender Offer from TRC Capital
summary: AT&T Inc. ("AT&T") has learned that TRC Capital Investment Corporation ("TRC") has made an unsolicited "mini-tender" offer, dated May 5, 2025. TRC has offered to purchase up to 4 million shares of AT&T common stock at $26.38 per share. The offer expires on June 3, 2025, unless extended by TRC.

headline: How to Boost Your Portfolio with Top Computer and Technology Stocks Set to Beat Earnings
